title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CPU/GPU runner for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & more with a built-in model registry and simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, embeddings and chat wrappers; pip install langchain-ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker with file upload, multimodal & RAG support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility; Maven Central artifact net.ollama:ollama4j.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a Copilot-style assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama providing Generator & Embedding components; pip install ollama-haystack.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for RAG, function-calling, fine-tuning and Docker deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered applications.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with Swagger decorators; npm install @ollama/nestjs.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; go get github.com/ollama/ollama-go.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Open-WebUI, LiteLLM proxy and GPU flags.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that sends selected blocks to any Ollama model for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate wrapping the Ollama REST API; cargo add ollama-rs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin enabling LLM assistance inside notes via Ollama backends.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Utility to convert & push Hugging Face models into the Ollama registry with one command.
